title: 1 Million American Pension Plans Could Be Insolvent In 10 Years
teaser: The agency in charge of insuring private-sector pension plans is warning about big problems on the horizon. The Pension Benefit Guarantee Corporation projects that several large multi-employer plans will become insolvent within the next decade.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
